TextEng: "I can't waste my time listening to a drunk's tall tales."
Text: "술주정뱅이의 허풍을 들으며 시간 낭비할 순 없어."

TextEng: "I want to ask you some questions."
"What do you think about these attacks?"
"Start at the beginning. How did you get inside a dragon?"
Text: "처음부터 시작해. 어떻게 용 안에 들어가게 된 거야?"

TextEng: "Hurry up and get to the dragon part."
"You really ate your way out of a live dragon?"
"I'll join you in that feast, friend dwarf."
"Don't aggravate me or I just might."
Text: "날 건드리지 마. 아니면 정말 그럴지도 몰라."

TextEng: "So I got carried away during the battle. So what?"
"What do you mean? I didn't do anything."
"I'm good at killing, and that's what's important."
Text: "난 죽이는 데 능숙해, 그게 중요한 거지."

TextEng: "If people get in my way, there's nothing I can do."
Text: "사람들이 내 길을 막으면, 어쩔 수 없잖아."

TextEng: "It wasn't my intention to harm anyone but the enemy, my lady. I apologize."
Text: "적이 아닌 사람을 해칠 의도는 없었어요, 부인. 사과드립니다."

TextEng: "Did I see you fighting during the battle here?"
"What do you know about the attacks on Waterdeep?"

Text: "네가 할 수 있는 일은 아무것도 없었어."

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Intimidate]</Start> "The name is <FirstName> and you had better open that door up before I get angry!"
Text: <StartCheck>[위협]</Start> 내 이름은 <FirstName>이야. 화내기 전에 문 열어!

TextEng: "I am <FullName>. Perhaps you have heard of me?"
"Pardon me, but my name is <FullName> and I was told you might help me."
Text: "실례지만, 제 이름은 <FullName>이고 당신이 도와줄 수 있다는 말을 들었어요."

TextEng: "Actually, I'm here see the fair maidens..."
"We'll see. It depends on the reward."
"Yes, I am. Are there many others here?"
"Your father isn't the only one in danger here, you know."
"Slow down there, girl. Leave this to experienced adventurers."
"And you think you can do something about it?"
Text: "그래서 네가 뭘 할 수 있다고 생각해?"

TextEng: "You want to come along? Fine by me."
"I can't spend all my time protecting you. Forget it."
Text: "널 보호하는 데 시간을 다 쓸 순 없어. 됐어."

TextEng: "Your mother is right. Your place is here."
Text: "네 어머니 말이 맞아. 네 자리는 여기야."

TextEng: "You can help by going to the city guard and telling them what's happened here."
Text: "시 경비대에 가서 여기서 무슨 일이 있었는지 알려주면 도움이 될 거야."

TextEng: "You think you can fight? Don't make me laugh."
"There was another attack in the well room. He's fine."
"Would you like to work with me?"
"Who are you and why are you here?"
